data.comment: The whistle has gone to start the match.
Can Kashiwa get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Kawasaki's half?
In the minute 2, Kashiwa awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Jumpei Iida signals a free kick to Kashiwa in their own half.
Throw-in for Kashiwa in their own half.
In the minute 5, Kashiwa are pushing forward but Michael Olunga's finish is wide of the goal.
The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Michael Olunga.
Kawasaki have a goal kick.
In the minute 7, Kashiwa's Michael Olunga is back in action after a slight knock.
Free kick for Kashiwa in their own half.
Kashiwa have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 10, Corner awarded to Kashiwa.
Kawasaki takes a corner from the right.
Jumpei Iida has awarded Kawasaki a corner.
In the minute 11, Kazuya Yamamura (Kawasaki) wins the ball in the air but heads wide.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Kashiwa.
Ball safe as Kawasaki is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 13, Free kick for Kawasaki in the half of Kashiwa.
Goal! Michael Olunga gives Kashiwa a 1-0 lead.
Jumpei Iida has awarded Kawasaki a corner.
In the minute 16, Ao Tanaka (Kawasaki) gets in a powerful header but the ball is cleared away.
Jumpei Iida awards the home team a throw-in.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 18, Throw-in Kashiwa.
Kawasaki to take a throw-in in Kashiwa territory.
Kashiwa's Cristiano misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 19, Jumpei Iida awards Kawasaki a goal kick.
Throw-in for Kawasaki in the half of Kashiwa.
Corner awarded to Kawasaki.
In the minute 21, Kashiwa awarded a free kick in their own half.
Tatsuya Hasegawa is booked for the away team.
Ataru Esaka of Kashiwa gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 22, Ball goes out of play for a Kawasaki goal kick.
Free kick Kashiwa.
Kashiwa drives forward and Michael Olunga gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
In the minute 24, Free kick for Kashiwa in their own half.
Jumpei Iida signals a free kick to Kawasaki in their own half.
In the minute 27, Leandro Damiao (Kawasaki) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Takuma Ominami (Kashiwa) gets a yellow card.
Throw-in for Kawasaki at Sankyo Frontier Kashiwa Stadium.
Jumpei Iida signals a Kashiwa throw-in in Kawasaki's half.
In the minute 29, Kawasaki takes a corner from the right.
Can Kawasaki capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Kashiwa's half?
Kawasaki push upfield and Ao Tanaka gets his head to the ball. The attempt is cleared by an alert Kashiwa defence.
In the minute 31, Corner awarded to Kawasaki.
Throw-in for Kashiwa in their own half.
Kashiwa awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 34, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Can Kawasaki get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Kashiwa's half?
Goal kick for Kashiwa at Sankyo Frontier Kashiwa Stadium.
In the minute 35, Free kick for Kawasaki in their own half.
In Kashiwa a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Kashiwa awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 39, Jumpei Iida signals a free kick to Kawasaki in their own half.
Kashiwa awarded a free kick in their own half.
Kazuya Yamamura (Kawasaki) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
In the minute 43, Throw-in for Kawasaki at Sankyo Frontier Kashiwa Stadium.
Kashiwa are too eager and fall into an offside trap.
Jumpei Iida has awarded Kawasaki a corner.
In the minute 45, Kawasaki's Kazuya Yamamura attacks the ball with his head but his effort fails to hit the target.
Kashiwa have a goal kick.
The 1st half is prolonged by 3 minutes of added time.
In the minute 45, Jumpei Iida signals a free kick to Kashiwa in their own half.
Free kick for Kawasaki in their own half.
The first-half has ended.
In the minute 46, The whistle has gone to start the second-half.
The away team replace Tatsuya Hasegawa with Kaoru Mitoma.
Akihiro Ienaga is replacing Manabu Saito for the away team.
In the minute 46, Goal! Yusuke Segawa extends Kashiwa's lead to 2-0.
That's a fine assist from Kengo Kitazume.
Throw-in for Kawasaki in the half of Kashiwa.
In the minute 48, Kawasaki drive upfield and Ao Tanaka gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Kashiwa defender.
Kawasaki takes a corner from the right.
Jumpei Iida has awarded Kawasaki a corner.
In the minute 48, Goal! Akihiro Ienaga (Kawasaki) scores with a header to reduce the deficit to 2-1.
Ao Tanaka with an assist there.
Throw-in high up the field for Kawasaki in Kashiwa.
In the minute 50, Kashiwa are coming forward and Cristiano gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Jumpei Iida awards Kawasaki a goal kick.
Jumpei Iida signals a Kawasaki throw-in in Kashiwa's half.
In the minute 51, Throw-in Kashiwa.
Throw-in for Kawasaki close to the penalty box.
Kawasaki's Reo Hatate misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 54, Ball goes out of play for a Kashiwa goal kick.
Ball safe as Kashiwa is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Goal! Leandro Damiao equalizes to bring the score to 2-2.
In the minute 55, Kaoru Mitoma instrumental with a fine assist.
Jumpei Iida awards the home team a throw-in.
Kashiwa awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 57, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In Kashiwa, Ataru Esaka of Kashiwa is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Jumpei Iida signals a free kick to Kashiwa.
In the minute 60, Kawasaki awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Kawasaki have been awarded a corner by Jumpei Iida.
In Kashiwa Kawasaki drive forward through Miki Yamane. His shot is on target but it's saved.
In the minute 64, Throw-in for Kashiwa in the half of Kawasaki.
Nelsinho Baptista is making the team's first substitution at Sankyo Frontier Kashiwa Stadium with Hayato Nakama replacing Ataru Esaka.
Kashiwa needs to be cautious. Kawasaki have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 71, Kashiwa's Michael Olunga is whistled for offside at Sankyo Frontier Kashiwa Stadium.
Leandro Damiao (Kawasaki) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Kawasaki are coming forward and Reo Hatate gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 72, It's a goal kick for the home team in Kashiwa.
Goal kick for Kashiwa at Sankyo Frontier Kashiwa Stadium.
Kaoru Mitoma for Kawasaki drives towards goal at Sankyo Frontier Kashiwa Stadium. But the finish is unsuccessful.
In the minute 75, Free kick for Kashiwa in their own half.
Kashiwa make their second substitution with Hiroto Goya replacing Michael Olunga.
In Kashiwa a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 76, Jumpei Iida signals a throw-in for Kashiwa, close to Kawasaki's area.
Throw-in high up the field for Kashiwa in Kashiwa.
Kashiwa are pushing forward but Hidekazu Otani's finish is wide of the goal.
Jumpei Iida awards Kawasaki a goal kick.
Toru Oniki (Kawasaki) is making a third substitution, with Yu Kobayashi replacing Leandro Damiao.
In the minute 78, The away team have replaced Reo Hatate with Yasuto Wakizaka. This is the fourth substitution made today by Toru Oniki.
In the minute 78, Yusuke Kobayashi is on a sub for Hidekazu Otani for Kashiwa.
Shunki Takahashi is replacing Yusuke Segawa for Kashiwa at Sankyo Frontier Kashiwa Stadium.
Kaoru Mitoma of Kawasaki gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 80, Kashiwa have a goal kick.
Throw-in for Kawasaki in their own half.
Kawasaki take a 2-3 lead thanks to Akihiro Ienaga.
In the minute 81, Great play from Kaoru Mitoma to set up the goal.
Throw-in for Kashiwa at Sankyo Frontier Kashiwa Stadium.
Can Kashiwa get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Kawasaki's half?
In the minute 83, Jumpei Iida signals a Kawasaki throw-in in Kashiwa's half.
Free kick Kawasaki.
Throw-in Kashiwa.
In the minute 85, Ball safe as Kawasaki is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Kawasaki to take a throw-in in Kashiwa territory.
Kashiwa to take a throw-in in Kawasaki territory.
In the minute 88, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Kashiwa apply pressure and a brilliant scoring opportunity is created for Hayato Nakama. But the ball crashes against the crossbar!
It's a goal kick for the away team in Kashiwa.
The fourth official's board shows 5 minutes, which will be added to the 2nd half.
Jumpei Iida signals a free kick to Kashiwa in their own half.
Jumpei Iida signals a free kick to Kashiwa.
Kashiwa are coming forward and Taiyo Koga gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Ball goes out of play for a Kawasaki goal kick.
Jumpei Iida signals a Kashiwa throw-in in Kawasaki's half.
Jumpei Iida awards the away team a throw-in.
Kawasaki advance rapidly upfield but Jumpei Iida blows for offside.
Corner awarded to Kashiwa.
Jumpei Iida blows to end the match. The final score is 2-3.
Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Kyohei Noborizato for Kawasaki who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
Toru Oniki is making the team's fifth substitution at Sankyo Frontier Kashiwa Stadium with Shogo Taniguchi replacing Kyohei Noborizato.
Hidemasa Morita (Kawasaki) has received a first yellow card.
